headline: Boston Scientific Adds Starbucks And Takeda Leaders To Guide Capital And Growth
summary: Boston Scientific (NYSE: BSX) announced two new board appointments, Catherine R. Smith, CFO of Starbucks, and Christophe P. Weber, CEO of Takeda Pharmaceutical. The move expands the board and brings added finance and global healthcare leadership to the company. Boston Scientific focuses on medical devices, so board decisions can matter for how it prioritizes capital, product pipelines, and geographic focus. Adding leaders from Starbucks and Takeda gives the company access to perspectives...
